name: Cats Riding Rümbas
description:
Your master has forgotten to feed you! Destroy as many objects as you can, but clean up the mess afterwards or you will be punished. 

Slam objects into walls or each other to destroy them. Activate Rümbas by jumping on them, and then control them to suck up debris you created. Don't forget to recharge them, as they have limited battery. Also, don't commit any crimes under a camera!

Controls

  • AD - Move or turn around while on a Rümba
  • S - Crouch
  • Space - Jump (Also works on a Rümba)
  • J - Attack
  • K - Jump off a Rümba
  • Maintain crouch and jump at the same time to charge a more powerful jump!

This project was developed for a game design class assignment.
